title: "MIT Researchers Commercializing RFID and Computer Vision Robotics"
excerpt: "Researchers at the MIT Media Lab are employing radio frequency identification technology along with computer vision to enable robots to explore their environment in order to locate and move a targeted item that may not be visible."
